40.description: If any of your claims are non-adjoining, please explain the importance of having one grouping instead of 2 or more.

42.description: 3. How long have you been carrying on mining operations on this ground?

53.description: Quels claims utiliserez-vous pour le stockage des résidus?

56.description: Quelles claims utiliserez-vous pour la construction du bassin?
